FuncDef:
The access python-policy command configures a python policy template.
The undo access python-policy command deletes a python policy template.
By default, the python script extension function is disabled and no python policy template is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a python policy template.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: [~HUAWEI] access enable python extend script-package V800R011C10_pythonpackage_V1.0.zip
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The device supports flexible interoperation with RADIUS servers by calling python scripts. To configure a python policy template, run the access python-policy command so that interoperation requirements of different RADIUS servers can be met.
Prerequisites
The python script package has been uploaded to the cfcard: directory on the NE40E.
The python script extension function has been enabled.
Precautions
A maximum of 64 python policy templates can be configured on the device.
